name: Freecell Solitaire - Card Game
description:
Freecell Solitaire by Flying Pan is the #1 free classic card game you know and love for your iPhone, iPad, and iPod.

FreeCell Solitaire is played with a standard 52-card deck. The goal of the game is to move all the cards to the four Foundation piles (located in the top left) and build each suit up from Ace to King. When playing, use the four open cells (on the top right) to store cards as you are trying to win.

FreeCell Solitaire is one of the most popular card games included with Windows, and is now available for free for your Apple device! Play solitaire games that require skill, strategy and patience to win! A true brain training experience! If you enjoy brain teasers, you’ll love FreeCell Solitaire!

=====GAME FEATURES======
• Free cell solitaire game rules
• Crisp, beautiful, and easy to read cards
• Efficient, fast, and sensible game interface
• Customization background and card
• Tap to move or drag and drop cards
• Unlimited undos, Smart hints
• Statistics
• Game state saved when interrupted
• Play in Portrait or Landscape
• Left handed and Right handed option
• Auto complete to finish game
• Unlimited number of free games

If you loved strategy games like Sudoku, Klondike, Solitiare, Spider Solitaire or casino card games, you’ll love the FreeCell challenge. Put your card playing and strategy skills to the test, and download FreeCell for Free today! Enjoy the best FreeCell Solitaire app out there!
